Package com.berthoud.project3oc.gameclasses

Class Game1ModeDefender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.berthoud.project3oc.gameclasses.Games
      • com.berthoud.project3oc.gameclasses.Game1
        • com.berthoud.project3oc.gameclasses.Game1ModeDefender
  • public class Game1ModeDefender
extends Game1
    The program Game1ModeDefender implements the first game (+/-) in the mode defender: the user chooses a code and the computer tries to break it

    • Field Detail

      • rangeCodeToBeFound

        private int[][] rangeCodeToBeFound
        This field is need for the AI part of the program. It refers to the min and max possible value of each digit of the Games.codeToBeFound

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        This method is a wrapper-method that starts and executes the game until the end. All the methods required for the execution of the game are called within this wrapper-method. The implementation is different for each game and mode.
        Specified by:
        play in class Games

        This method takes a guess and display the validation code

      • initRangeCodeToBeFound

        private int[][] initRangeCodeToBeFound()
        The method is used for the AI part. Set the initial range of each digit of the code to be found to min =0, max =9
        Returns:
        the instance field X
        See Also:
        = X

      • displayProposalComputer

        private void displayProposalComputer​(int[] codeProposal)
        This method displays the proposal code of the computer in the expected format
        Parameters:
        codeProposal - guess attempt

      • inputValidationAndAnswerComputer

        private void inputValidationAndAnswerComputer()
        This method is used for the AI part. It inputs and tests the validation code entered by the user and make an appropriate next guess
        See Also:
        updateRangeCodeToBeFound(int[][], int[], String[]), newProposal(int[][], int[], String[])

      • updateRangeCodeToBeFound

        private int[][] updateRangeCodeToBeFound​(int[][] range,
                                         int[] proposal,
                                         java.lang.String[] validation)
        The method is used for the AI part. Restrict the range of each digit of the code to be found after each validation of a proposal code
        Parameters:
        range - this is range before validation
        proposal - the proposal code
        validation - the validation code
        Returns:
        the updated (restricted) range after validation
        See Also:
        Games.codeProposal, Game1.validation(int[], int[]), rangeCodeToBeFound

      • newProposal

        private int[] newProposal​(int[][] newRange,
                          int[] proposal,
                          java.lang.String[] validation)
        The method is used for the AI part. It updates the instance field Games.codeProposal used for the next guess of the computer
        Parameters:
        newRange - the output of updateRangeCodeToBeFound(int[][], int[], String[])
        proposal - the instance field Games.codeProposal to be updated
        validation - Game1.validation(int[], int[])
        Returns:
        an updated instance field Games.codeProposal
